name: Fragment: My Empty Rooms
description:
Fragments is an experimental series of little game/side-projects which are freely can be anything.

My Empty Rooms is a debut project within the series and it tries to capture a melancholic rainy mood within a semi-realistic indoor environment. There are no real gameplay except wandering around. All in-game photos are original and taken somewhere in 2011-2012.

This Fragment has no ending.

Game will run in borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution and refresh rate.

System requirements:

  • 64-bit Windows PC that can run UE4 on medium settings
  • ~250 Mb free disk space

The game is free, but donations are welcome.
